game

Class AmmunitionBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
      • game.AmmunitionBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Capable, Printable, ItemInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShotgunAmmunitionBox, SniperAmmunitionBox

    public abstract class AmmunitionBox
extends Item
    An AmmunitionBox for different kinds of ammunition. Eg sniper ammunition and shotgun ammunition.

    This class models an AmmunitionBox, as an Item, that can be used by weapons that requires ammunition in order to operate.

    It provides methods to get the amount of ammunition in the box, change the amount of ammunition left in the box and description to show how manys ammunition left in the box.

    Author:
    Hee Weng Sheng
